title: Stethoscope
description: A stethoscope with a round resonator and two earpieces. Shown in black, blue, green, or red, depending on the platform.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the stethoscope emoji presents a clean, professional aesthetic with its polished metallic head and smooth, flexible tubing.  The realistic lighting accentuates its curve, giving it a tactile feel that speaks to its purpose in healthcare and well-being. This emoji, as rendered by Apple, is a clear symbol of medical care, listening, and concern, often used to convey support for someone undergoing treatment or to signify a doctor's appointment in digital conversations.
